solution_line_template: They collected $250 from Bronze Status families because {num_bronze_families} times {bronze_donation_amount} equals <<{num_bronze_families}*{bronze_donation_amount}={bronze_total_collected}>>{bronze_total_collected}.

They collected $350 from Silver Status families because {num_silver_families} times {silver_donation_amount} equals <<{num_silver_families}*{silver_donation_amount}={silver_total_collected}>>{silver_total_collected}.
They collected $100 from Gold Status families because {num_gold_families} times {gold_donation_amount} equals {gold_total_collected}.

Therefore, they collected $700 thus far because {bronze_total_collected} plus {silver_total_collected} plus {gold_total_collected} equals <<{bronze_total_collected}+{silver_total_collected}+{gold_total_collected}={total_collected_thus_far}>>{total_collected_thus_far}.
They need to collect $50 more because {fundraiser_goal} minus {total_collected_thus_far} equals {amount_needed}.
